channel.title: prenote on Oh The Huge Manatee!
channel.description: Recent content in prenote on Oh The Huge Manatee!

item.title: Four Drupalists
item.description: Recently some of my work on prenotes came up, and reminded me that I’ve wanted to post favorite moments here for some time. For those who don’t know, a prenote is a session before the keynote of a conference or event. During that session, notables from across the community put on a humorous show of parody lyrics karaoke, terribly scripted dialogue, and general silliness. It’s a great way to kick off an event, and really sets the tone if you’re into flat-hierarchy and openness for newbies.
